org.ensor.robots.motors

Interface IMotorWithEncoder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ICurrentMeasurable, IMotor

    public interface IMotorWithEncoder
extends IMotor
    Author:
    jona

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long getEncoderPosition()
      This method returns the current position of the quadrature encoder register.
      boolean getEncoderQuatratureMode()
      This method returns true if the motor has a quadrature encoder and 'false' if the motor has an absolute position encoder.
      long getEncoderSpeed()
      This method returns the current speed of the motor in terms of quadrature encoder pulses per second.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.ensor.robots.motors.IMotor

        setDutyCycle

      • Methods inherited from interface org.ensor.robots.motors.ICurrentMeasurable

        getCurrentDraw, getVoltage

    • Method Detail

      • getEncoderPosition

        long getEncoderPosition()
        This method returns the current position of the quadrature encoder register.
        Returns:
        The current value of the quadrature encoder register.

      • getEncoderSpeed

        long getEncoderSpeed()
        This method returns the current speed of the motor in terms of quadrature encoder pulses per second.
        Returns:
        The number of pulses per second of the quadrature encoder.

      • getEncoderQuatratureMode

        boolean getEncoderQuatratureMode()
        This method returns true if the motor has a quadrature encoder and 'false' if the motor has an absolute position encoder.
        Returns:
        True if the motor has a quadrature encoder.
